com.simpleecm.imageprocessing.views

Class PopupMenuCompat

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.simpleecm.imageprocessing.views.PopupMenuCompat

  • public abstract class PopupMenuCompat
extends java.lang.Object

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static interface  PopupMenuCompat.OnMenuItemClickListener
      Interface responsible for receiving menu item click events if the items themselves do not have individual item click listeners.

    • Method Detail

      • newInstance

        public static PopupMenuCompat newInstance(Context context,
                                          View view)
        Construct a new PopupMenu.
        Parameters:
        context - Context for the PopupMenu.
        view - Anchor view for this popup. The popup will appear below the anchor if there is room, or above it if there is not.

      • getContext

        public Context getContext()

      • dismiss

        public abstract void dismiss()
        Dismiss the menu popup.
        See Also:
        show()

      • getMenu

        public abstract Menu getMenu()
        Returns:
        The Menu associated with this popup. Populate the returned Menu with items before calling show().
        See Also:
        show(), getMenuInflater()

      • getMenuInflater

        public abstract MenuInflater getMenuInflater()
        Returns:
        A MenuInflater that can be used to inflate menu items from XML into the menu returned by getMenu().
        See Also:
        getMenu()

      • inflate

        public abstract void inflate(int menuResourceId)
        Inflate a menu resource into this PopupMenu. This is equivalent to calling popupMenu.getMenuInflater().inflate(menuRes, popupMenu.getMenu()).
        Parameters:
        menuResourceId - The menu resource to inflate.

      • setOnMenuItemClickListener

        public abstract void setOnMenuItemClickListener(PopupMenuCompat.OnMenuItemClickListener menuItemClickListener)
        Set a listener that will be notified when the user selects an item from the menu.
        Parameters:
        menuItemClickListener - The listener to notify.

      • show

        public abstract void show()
        Show the menu popup anchored to the view specified during construction.
        See Also:
        dismiss()
